metadata.title: CVE-2024-22017 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: setuid() does not affect libuv's internal io_uring operations ifinitialized before the call to setuid().This allows the process to perform privileged operations despite presumablyhaving dropped such privileges through a call to setuid().This vulnerability affects all users using version greater or equal thanNode.js 18.18.0, Node.js 20.4.0 and Node.js 21.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
